quote: At about mile 20 of a 74 mile race, in a maze of forest roads and trails, 2 states from my home
Well, hell hath no fury like the Francis Marion National Forest. I got lucky navigating some complicated muddy sections. But I landed in the mud twice. Ginny five times...
Post-race food (included with registration) will be available from Empanada Cuisines! Podiums will be presented approximately 20 minutes after each race.
The Francis Marion National Forest (just north of Charleston, SC) once played host to the Swamp Fox; a Revolutionary War hero that made life hell for British troops.
